title: [Large-scale] Activity-Based Learning Program for Anxiety Management and Improved Mathematics Achievement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computational skills in elementary mathematics
context.additional_context: Utilizes online collaboration tools (Rain Class-like platforms) in personalized BYOD environments

learning_goals: Reduction of anxiety levels by 20% during mathematics problem-solving processes through activity-based learning techniques (clickers, group discussions, etc.).
Explanation of three or more strategies for managing cognitive anxiety when solving complex mathematics problems through collaborative learning.
The activity-based learning group demonstrates a 15% or greater improvement in mathematics achievement compared to the traditional lecture-based group in weekly comprehensive assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
